thread.title: Uncle Eddie Uncle Eddies MX
thread.title_full: Mark Worthington Jewellers reviewed by Uncle Eddie Uncle Eddies MX

author: Uncle Eddie Uncle Eddies MX
title: Uncle Eddie Uncle Eddies MX
text:
I just called to talk about a watch on Ebay I asked about other watches they had on stock then booked to view them.
All went very well all the staff are very polite I was in my work clothes and got major sucked up to lol.
I got discount on a new Rolex but looked at others these had been described well and where great value for money.
This is a professional trusted company who make a living out of supplying good product everything was correct.
